backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, player progress, score submissions, and leaderboard retrieval with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report mapping implemented game features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference list summarizing major frontend files with brief descriptions of their purpose.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global OKLCH color variables and dark mode theming.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes for all pages and wraps the app in a theme provider and toaster.
frontend/src/components/game/GameOverDia: Overlay dialog shown on game over offering restart and return-to-menu options.
frontend/src/components/game/HUD.tsx: Displays game HUD with score, coins, timers, speed, health, nitro charge, active power-ups, and pause/restart buttons.
frontend/src/components/game/LevelComple: Shows a modal with level completion stats and buttons for next level or returning to menu.
frontend/src/components/game/PauseOverla: Renders a pause menu with options to resume, restart, open settings, or return to main menu.
frontend/src/components/game/TouchContro: Provides on-screen touch controls for left, right, and boost actions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal dialog allowing authenticated users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/game/assets.ts: Defines asset paths and provides functions to preload all images into memory.
frontend/src/game/cars.ts: Defines car configurations, stats, and asset mappings for each car type.
frontend/src/game/engine.ts: Implements the main game engine managing state, updates, input, collisions, spawning, power-ups, and nitro logic.
frontend/src/game/input.ts: Manages keyboard and touch input states for movement and boosting.
frontend/src/game/levels.ts: Defines level configurations, ordering, and retrieves the next level in progression.
frontend/src/game/powerups.ts: Defines power-up types, structures, durations, and descriptions.
frontend/src/game/render.ts: Implements GameRenderer to draw backgrounds, objects, power-ups, and the player onto a canvas using game state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity login, persistence, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useProgress.ts: Loads, updates, and saves player progress either locally or via backend depending on authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating progress, scores, and user profiles through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSettings.ts: Manages game settings by combining backend-stored audio flags with locally stored graphics and control preferences.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom variables and neon-themed utility classes for styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Initializes and runs the main game loop, handling rendering, engine updates, state transitions, and UI overlays like pause, level complete, and game over.
frontend/src/pages/GaragePage.tsx: Displays available cars, their unlock status, and allows players to purchase and unlock cars using coins.
frontend/src/pages/HowToPlayPage.tsx: Shows instructions for controls, objectives, power-ups, collectibles, and obstacles to guide players on gameplay basics.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Fetches and displays global top scores and personal bests, formatting score data and levels for the leaderboard UI.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenuPage.tsx: Renders the main menu with options to start, continue, view garage, leaderboard, and manage authentication and profile setup.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Renders the game settings UI with audio toggles, graphics quality selector, and controls options using custom hooks and styled components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom neon color palette, animations, plugins, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Describes the game project state, feature list, required assets, and high-level design details for Speed Racer: Urban Drift.
